delAnn: Time before orders waiting for payment cancelation (hours)
requestMailPendingCarts: Time before reminder by mail to the customer of his pending cart (hours)
requestMailPendingCartsHelp: Cannot be higher than time before cart expiration
returnStockToFront: Send stock info to front (require restart)
nbDaysToDeleteOlderFailedPayment: Nb of days before deleting failed payment
